Package org.javalite.activeweb

Class ErrorRouteBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.javalite.activeweb.ErrorRouteBuilder
public class ErrorRouteBuilder extends Object
Instance of this class represents a single custom route configured in the RouteConfig for capturing exceptions.
Author:
Igor Polevoy
